bug.author: devitnow15
bug.summary: update tutorial for tensorflow object detection api , generate_tf_record is giving a tough time
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://tensorflow-object-detection-api-tutorial.readthedocs.io/en/latest/training.html>https://tensorflow-object-detection-api-tutorial.readthedocs.io/en/latest/training.html</denchmark-link>
update generate_tf_record file according to running version in tensor flow.

comments.comment: I would like to work on this. Please assign!

The GitHub repository you are referring to is not maintained by offfical TensorFlow team. Perhaps your issue is more suitable on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sglvladi/TensorFlowObjectDetectionTutorial/issues>https://github.com/sglvladi/TensorFlowObjectDetectionTutorial/issues</denchmark-link> . Please try posting it there. Thanks!
